_description: One couplet in a collection of Latin sermons

AbeUL154.Transcription: yore was a londe wrathe & hate an honde
AbeUL154.Note:
Written as a single line across the top of the final page of the ms.,
                    along with 6217, 6446, 6610.
AbeUL154.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Catalogue of the medieval manuscripts in the University Library,
                Aberdeen.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1932: 51.
